title: How do i get people to stop asking me out everywhere i go without sacrificing my lifestyle?
body:
unlike what people were inclined to think in my last thread, i am more than capable of brushing people off. The problem is that i have to do it every time i go out, everywhere i go. It's old. I don't have the energy to say "no" 100 times every shopping session, nor do i have the patience for it.

Everywhere i go i see this:

I need advice before i go insane.
